definition: (political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: Keep Transact-SQL transactions (BEGIN TRANSACTION…COMMIT/ROLLBACK) as short as possible within a stored procedure.
sentences.chinese: 尽可能的使用短小的事务在存储过程里面。

sentences.english: What if I have several million transactions?
sentences.chinese: 如果有几百万个事务怎么办？

sentences.english: Convenience is， however， in all affairs of life， an execrable test of value.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在生活的一切事务中投合是可恶的实用准则。

sentences.english: When he was not at the firm, Obama was teaching at the University of Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 他不在事务所的时候，就会去芝加哥大学讲课。

sentences.english: Constitutional Affairs, Ford F150 2004 Super four-wheel drive.
sentences.chinese: 政制事务局2004年福特F150超级四轮驱动。

sentences.english: The following information is provided by Macau Inter-University Institute and posted by Student Affairs Section.
sentences.chinese: 以下资料由澳门高等校际学院提供，学生事务处代传。

sentences.english: Zhoubo, obtained his LLB degree from East China University of Politics and Law , is the senior partner of Shanghai Wintell Law Firm.
sentences.chinese: 华东政法大学法学学士，上海瀛泰律师事务所合伙人。

sentences.english: The following information is provided by the Macao Orchestra of ICM and posted by Student Affairs Section.
sentences.chinese: 以下资料由文化局澳门乐团提供，学生事务处代传。

sentences.english: The point of goal-setting is to improve the quality of the present.
sentences.chinese: 设定目标的关键点是提升你此刻处理事务的质量。

sentences.english: The gifts of charity meddled with a man's private affair.
sentences.chinese: 慈善团体的赠品受到了某人私人事务的干涉。

sentences.english: Hence the team's activities are not well described by transactional workflows.
sentences.chinese: 因此，团队的活动不好由事务工作流描述。

sentences.english: However, if the transaction dies due to instance failure, block-level recovery makes a row available before the entire transaction is recovered.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果该事务由于数据库实例出错的原因死掉了。

sentences.english: The Education Department said coaching was 'a private matter for parents'.
sentences.chinese: 州教育部说补习是家长们私人的事务。

sentences.english: However, in HSR territory, the issue is even more important.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在高铁领域，这项事务更是重中之重。

sentences.english: The Hong Kong Museum of Art is one of the museums managed by the Leisure & Cultural Services Department.
sentences.chinese: 香港艺术馆是康乐及文化事务署辖下博物馆之一。

sentences.english: Mark Malloch-Brown has been involved in international affairs for more than three decades.
sentences.chinese: 马克马洛赫褐色一直参与国际事务超过三十年。

definition: to show an interest in/to get involved with
in charge (of a position etc)/the person in charge/responsible
